data.eml:eml: Review of the Philippine taxa formerly assigned to the genus Amphicnemis Selys, II. Genus Sangabasis with descriptions of eight new species (Odonata: Coenagrionidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Villanueva, R. J. T., Dow, R. A. (2014): Review of the Philippine taxa formerly assigned to the genus Amphicnemis Selys, II. Genus Sangabasis with descriptions of eight new species (Odonata: Coenagrionidae). Zootaxa 3815 (1): 1-28, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3815.1.1
